org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

接口 RSGroupableBalancer

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, ConfigurationObserver, LoadBalancer, Stoppable
    所有已知实现类:
    RSGroupBasedLoadBalancer

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface RSGroupableBalancer
extends LoadBalancer
    Marker Interface. RSGroups feature will check for a LoadBalancer marked with this Interface before it runs.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String HBASE_RSGROUP_LOADBALANCER_CLASS
      Config for pluggable load balancers

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.LoadBalancer

        BOGUS_SERVER_NAME, SYSTEM_TABLES_ON_MASTER, TABLES_ON_MASTER

    • 方法概要

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.LoadBalancer

        balanceCluster, balanceCluster, initialize, isSystemTablesOnlyOnMaster, isTablesOnMaster, onConfigurationChange, postMasterStartupInitialize, randomAssignment, regionOffline, regionOnline, retainAssignment, roundRobinAssignment, setClusterLoad, setClusterMetrics, setMasterServices

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable

        getConf, setConf

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Stoppable

        isStopped, stop

    • 字段详细资料
